content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #88862 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
It's hard to prioritize this without seeing an MCVE, but maybe P-high for now?

there is some investigation ongoing the in the linked Zulip topic
https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/122651-general/topic/cargo.20build.20hangs.2C.20how.20to.20minimize/near/252922141

hopefully it will lead to some clarifications
We have a partial MCVE now (posted as a Gist in the issue). I pinged the cleanup crew to see if someone can minimize further.
after a lot of work from the issue reporter we now seem to have what looks like a sufficient minimal reproducible. I think this issue can fall in the P-medium category
